name: Just Roll With It (itch) (Hypesio, creativetherapyco, Blxck Cxsper, Thetos)
name_original: Just Roll With It (itch) (Hypesio, creativetherapyco, Blxck Cxsper, Thetos)
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2022 Submission
Theme : Roll of the dice

Special habilities (press LShift to use)

  • Happy : Double Jump
  • Angry : Stomp (need to be in the air), can kill ennemies
  • Excited : Dash

Disclaimer : We didn't have enough time to go further in level design. New and improved levels may be added after the jam
